msg: Updated link to the printed version of the complete log4j manual.

msg: patch from Raymond DeCampo to support the older XMLLayout file format.

author: mwomack
msg: Added SocketHubReceiver.  As with SocketReceiver, test cases are forthcoming.

author: mwomack
msg: Added SocketNodeEventListener.  This listener can be used by the SocketNode creator to learn when the node closes the associated socket.
Factored some of the code in SocketNode.
